mean_en: not giving good, steady, or useful results :not productive
word_etyma: un 非 + product 生产 + ive 表示有...性质的、有...作用的、有...倾向的→ adj. 非生产性的；徒劳的；不毛的；不生产的
short_phrase: her unproductive behavior at the meeting
sentence: She is always unproductive at work--she plays around when she should be working.
sentence_trans: 她工作总是没有效益-该工作的时候吊儿郎当。
